subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Coaches and Managers
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Coach Jill Ellis continues to face outside opposition to her tactics, with some detractors calling for more fluidity and attacking ingenuity as the team prepares to play China in the quarterfinals.
snippet: Coach Jill Ellis continues to face outside opposition to her tactics, with some detractors calling for more fluidity and attacking ingenuity as the team prepares to play China in the quarterfinals.
